commit message: Android 4 migration: Minimum device API is 16 now. All tests passed.
Migrated to the native Android ActionBar

Got rid of legacy MyActionBar. Established 'Up' navigation between
activities
Timeline title added, new icons added, new Global search icon

GNUsocial.de, Quitter.no, Quitter.is and GNUsocial.no added to the list
of the preconfigured 'Microblogging systems'

Implementing task 136: Account creation and connection to LoadAverage
stopped working
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/136
Skip automatic backup creation if not enabled in AndStatus settings
Fixed file download for TLS 1.1 and TLS 1.2 #136

Fixed: textLimit of StatusNet sites defaulted to 140 characters. Now 0
in config is interpreted as 5000 characters in AndStatus
Fixing againg #92: Cannot add new Twitter account for Android before 4.2
